Earthcry is a musical project created in 2010 by the drummer/composer Enrico Sidoti (ex-Razorblade). 

Current Line-up:
Leone Villani Conti -- Bass
Enrico Sidoti -- Drums
Bruno Di Giorgi -- Guitars
Tommi Delfino -- Keyboards

Guest Musicians:
Oliver Hartmann -- Vocals
Mark Basile (DMG) -- Vocals
Zak Stevens (Circle II Circle) -- Vocals

Damian Wilson (Threshold, Headspace, DWB) -- Vocals
Roberto Tiranti (Labyrinth) -- Vocals
